name: John GALLESE, Appellant, v. Daniel MOORE, Steven Flynn and Delmar Tavern, Inc., t/a Delmar Tavern

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
McDERMOTT, j., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: John GALLESE, Appellant, v. Daniel MOORE, Steven Flynn and Delmar Tavern, Inc., t/a Delmar Tavern.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed. See Paulish v. Bakaitis, 442 Pa. 434, 275 A.2d 318 (1971).
McDERMOTT, j., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Nino Y. Tinari, Michael Tinari, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Lawrence M. Otter, Philadelphia, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
581 A.2d 1376
John GALLESE, Appellant, v. Daniel MOORE, Steven Flynn and Delmar Tavern, Inc., t/a Delmar Tavern.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 22, 1990.
Decided Nov. 9, 1990.
Nino Y. Tinari, Michael Tinari, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Lawrence M. Otter, Philadelphia, for appellees.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
